keyMoments.title: Luffy's Advantage Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates' captain proves to be Enel's natural enemy due to his rubber body's immunity to lightning.
keyMoments.significance: This gives the Straw Hats a fighting chance against the seemingly invincible Enel.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Reaffirms His Dream
keyMoments.description: Luffy declares to Enel that he will become King of the Pirates, refusing to join forces with the self-proclaimed god.
keyMoments.significance: Reaffirms the crew's ultimate goal and Luffy's unwavering commitment to his dream.

keyMoments.title: Enel's Weakness Exposed
keyMoments.description: God Enel discovers that his seemingly invincible lightning powers are completely useless against rubber.
keyMoments.significance: Shatters Enel's god complex and shows that even the most powerful can have weaknesses.

keyMoments.title: Deathpiea Activation
keyMoments.description: Enel activates his ultimate plan to destroy all of Skypiea using the Ark Maxim's Deathpiea system.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the full extent of God's Army's destructive capabilities and genocidal intentions.

reveals.information: God's Army's ultimate goal is to destroy Skypiea using Deathpiea before leaving for the Fairy Vearth
Despite their godlike leader, God's Army is vulnerable to opponents with rubber-based abilities
